app/pods/components/checkout-details/tem.source:
{{t 'wizard.cart.title'}}

{{#if (not this.isUpgrading)}} {{/if}}
{{#if @enableToggle}}
{{t (concat @bundle.translationBase 'title')}} {{t 'plan'}}
{{else}}
{{t (concat @bundle.translationBase 'title')}} {{t 'plan'}}:
{{/if}} {{#if this.showFeatures}}
{{#each this.featureList as |feature|}} {{#unless feature.hideCart}}
{{t feature.title}}
{{/unless}} {{/each}}
{{/if}}
{{t "wizard.cart.subtotal"}}
{{t (concat "wizard.cart.price." @bundle.currency) amount=@bundle.price.monthly}}
{{t 'wizard.cart.months' months=@bundle.monthsPerCycle}}
{{#if (or (and this.hasCoupon (gt this.discountNow 0)) (gt this.proratedAmount 0))}}
{{t "wizard.cart.original_price"}}
{{t (concat "wizard.cart.price." @bundle.currency) amount=@bundle.price.price}}
{{#if (and this.hasCoupon (gt this.discountNow 0))}}
{{t "wizard.cart.discount_label"}} ({{this.couponPreview}})
{{t (concat 'currency_symbol.' @bundle.currency)}}{{this.discountNow}}
{{/if}} {{#if (gt this.proratedAmount 0)}}
{{t "wizard.cart.prorated_adjustment"}}
({{t (concat 'currency_symbol.' @bundle.currency)}}{{this.proratedAmount}})
{{this.propratedPeriod}}
{{/if}}
{{/if}}
{{t "wizard.cart.total"}}
{{t (concat 'currency_symbol.' @bundle.currency)}}{{this.proratedTotalNow}}
{{#if this.showCouponForm}}
{{else}} {{#if this.hasCoupon}}
{{t "wizard.cart.coupon_applied"}}
{{t 'wizard.cart.discount_disclaimer'}}
{{#if (not @isInCartDisclaimerTestGroup)}} {{t 'wizard.cart.tos_discount_disclaimer'}} {{/if}} {{t "wizard.cart.update_coupon"}}
{{/if}} {{/if}}
{{#if (and @billingInfo @billingInfo.details.type ) }} {{#if (eq @billingInfo.details.type 'credit_card')}}
{{t 'wizard.cart.redesign-test.credit'}}
{{t 'wizard.cart.redesign-test.credit_text'}}
{{t 'wizard.cart.ends_with'}} ({{@billingInfo.details.last_four}})
{{else if (eq @billingInfo.details.type 'paypal')}}
{{t 'wizard.cart.redesign-test.paypal'}}
{{t 'wizard.cart.redesign-test.paypal_text'}}
{{t 'wizard.cart.update_method'}}
{{/if}}
{{else}}
{{t 'wizard.cart.redesign-test.paypal'}}
{{t 'wizard.cart.redesign-test.paypal_text'}}
{{t 'wizard.cart.redesign-test.credit'}}
{{t 'wizard.cart.redesign-test.credit_text'}}
{{/if}} {{#if (gt this.proratedAmount 0)}}
{{t 'wizard.cart.prorated_disclaimer' datetime=this.prorationCalculationTime}}
{{/if}}
{{#if @isInCartDisclaimerTestGroup}}
{{t 'wizard.cart.tos_checkout_disclaimer'}} {{t "wizard.cart.terms_of_service"}}
{{/if}}

{{#if domainPlan}}

{{t 'account_settings.domains.disabled'}}
{{else}}
{{t 'account_settings.domains.registration_date'}}: {{selectedDomainPurchasedAtDate}}

{{t 'account_settings.domains.privacy_settings'}}: {{if isPrivate (t 'account_settings.domains.private') (t 'account_settings.domains.public')}}

{{if autoRenew (t 'account_settings.domains.on') (t 'account_settings.domains.off')}}
|
{{#if connectedDomainWebsite}} {{#if (eq connectedDomainWebsite.domain selectedDomain.name ) }} {{t 'account_settings.domains.status'}}: {{t 'account_settings.domains.un_assign' name=this.connectedDomainWebsite.name }}  |  {{t 'account_settings.domains.un-assign-btn'}}
{{t 'account_settings.domains.settings_btn'}}
{{/if}} {{else}} {{t 'account_settings.domains.status'}}: {{t 'account_settings.domains.un_assigned'}}
{{t 'account_settings.domains.connect_btn'}}
{{t 'account_settings.domains.settings_btn'}}
{{/if}} {{/if}}
{{else}}
{{/if}}

app/pods/components/reset-password-form/.source:
<form {{action (perform processReset) on='submit'}} class="tform reset-password-form">
	<label for="email">{{t 'email_address'}}</label>
	<Input @type="email" @id="email" @value={{email}} data-testing-id="email" />
	<button data-testing-id="login-button" type="submit" class="tbtn red-gradient rounded submit-btn mt-xs mb-xs relative">
		{{#if processReset.isRunning }}
      <BouncingLoader @class="primary white-dots" />
		{{else}}
			{{t 'reset'}}
		{{/if}}
	</button>
</form>

{{@selectedDomain.name}}
{{#if renewExpirationState}}
{{t 'domains.expired.expired_on'}} {{date-display @selectedDomain.expiresAt}}
{{t 'domains.expired.subsctiption_was'}} {{domainPlanDisplay}}
{{t 'domains.expired.renewal_price'}} {{t 'domains.plans.per_year' amount=@domainPlan.yearlyPrice currency=(t (concat 'currency_symbol.' @domainPlan.currency))}}
{{t 'domains.expired.search'}}
{{else if disabledExpirationState}}
{{t 'domains.expired.terminated'}} {{t 'domains.expired.repurchase'}} {{t 'domains.expired.search'}}
{{else}}
{{#if (eq @sites.length 0)}}
{{t 'domains.my_domain.create_website'}}
{{else}}
{{/if}}
{{t 'domains.my_domain.plan'}} {{this.planTranslationKey}}
{{#if this.autoRenew}} {{t 'domains.my_domain.renewal_date'}} {{else}} {{t 'domains.my_domain.expires_on'}} {{/if}} {{date-display @domainSubscription.expiresAt}}
{{#if (eq @selectedDomain.expirationState 'dunning')}}
{{t 'domains.expired.dunning'}}
{{#if assignedSite}} {{t 'account_settings.domains.status'}}: {{t 'account_settings.domains.un_assign' name=this.connectedDomainWebsite.name}} {{else}} {{t 'account_settings.domains.status'}}: {{t 'account_settings.domains.un_assigned'}} {{/if}} {{else}}
{{t 'account_settings.domains.auto_renew'}}
{{#if assignedSite}}
{{t 'account_settings.domains.status'}}: {{t 'account_settings.domains.un_assign' name=this.connectedDomainWebsite.name}} | {{t 'account_settings.domains.un-assign-btn'}}
{{else}} {{t 'account_settings.domains.status'}}: {{t 'account_settings.domains.un_assigned'}}
{{/if}} {{/if}}
{{/if}} {{#if showMailboxPromotion}}
{{t 'business_mailbox.my_domain.title'}}
{{t 'business_mailbox.my_domain.text'}}
{{/if}}

app/pods/components/domains/preferences/.source:
{{#if (not inline)}}
{{domains.domainName}}
{{/if}}
{{t 'websites.dashboard.domain'}}
{{#if disableSelection}} {{t 'websites.dashboard.domain'}} | {{t (concat 'domains.plans.months_' domains.plan.monthsPerCycle) }} {{else}}
{{t (concat 'domains.plans.months_' domains.plan.monthsPerCycle) }} {{#if (eq domains.repricingTestGroup 'test')}} {{#if (gt domains.currentPlanDiscount 0)}} {{t 'domains.plans.discount_off' discount=domains.currentPlanDiscount}} {{/if}} {{/if}}
{{/if}} {{#if showPlanMenu}}
{{#each domains.nonPrivacyPlans as |domainPlan|}}
{{t (concat 'domains.plans.months_' domainPlan.monthsPerCycle)}}
{{#if (eq domains.repricingTestGroup 'test')}} {{#if (gt domainPlan.planDiscount 0)}} {{t 'domains.plans.discount_off' discount=domainPlan.planDiscount}} {{else}} {{/if}} {{/if}} {{#if (eq domains.repricingTestGroup 'test')}} {{#if (gt domainPlan.planDiscount 0)}} | {{else}} {{/if}} {{else}} | {{/if}} {{t 'domains.plans.per_year' currency=currency amount=(price-display domainPlan.yearlyPrice)}}
{{/each}}
{{/if}}
{{currency}}{{planPrice}} {{t 'domains.plans.per_year' currency=currency amount=planPricePerYear}}
{{#if isOneYearFree}}
{{t 'domains.cart.one_year_free'}} -{{currency}}{{subscriptionTerms.discount_amount}}
{{/if}}
{{#if disableSelection}} {{#if domains.selectedPrivacy}} {{t 'domains.cart.privacy'}} {{/if}} {{else}}
{{t 'domains.cart.privacy'}}
{{/if}} {{#if (not domains.selectedPrivacy)}} {{t 'domains.cart.privacy_note'}} {{/if}}
{{#if domains.selectedPrivacy}}
{{currency}}{{privacyTotal}} {{t 'domains.plans.per_year' currency=currency amount=domains.terms.privacy_amount}}
{{/if}}
{{t 'domains.summary.total'}}
{{#if (and (eq domains.repricingTestGroup 'test') (not domains.selectedPlan.yearly))}} {{currency}}{{domains.currentPlanFullPrice}} {{/if}} {{currency}}{{totalAmount}}

app/pods/components/home/apollo/tasks-li.source:
<svg version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
         viewBox="0 0 1000 500" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet" width="100%" height="100%">
        <defs>
            <filter id="monochrome" type="matrix" color-interpolation-filters="sRGB">
                <feColorMatrix type="matrix"
                               values={{this.colorMartix}} />
            </filter>
            <filter id="whiteWash">
                <feComponentTransfer>
                    <feFuncR type="linear" slope="0"></feFuncR>
                    <feFuncG type="linear" slope="0"></feFuncG>
                    <feFuncB type="linear" slope="0"></feFuncB>
                </feComponentTransfer>
                <feComponentTransfer>
                    <feFuncR type="table" tableValues="1 0"></feFuncR>
                    <feFuncG type="table" tableValues="1 0"></feFuncG>
                    <feFuncB type="table" tableValues="1 0"></feFuncB>
                </feComponentTransfer>
            </filter>
        </defs>
        {{#if (eq @taskList 'logo_essentials')}}
            {{#if this.isWhiteLogo}}
                <image xlink:href="/images/components/apollo-tasks-list/logo_essentials_mockup_white.png" width="1000" height="800" x="0" y="-150"></image>
            {{else}}
                <image xlink:href="/images/components/apollo-tasks-list/logo_essentials_mockup.png" width="1000" height="800" x="0" y="-150"></image>
            {{/if}}
            <image xlink:href="{{@brandVersion.mockupUrl}}" width="400" height="280" x="290" y="85"></image>
            <image xlink:href="/images/components/apollo-tasks-list/logo_essentials_color.png" class="brand-color-filter" width="1000" height="800" x="0" y="-150"></image>
            <image xlink:href="/images/components/apollo-tasks-list/logo_essentials_color_1.png" class="brand-color-filter opacity-75" width="1000" height="800" x="0" y="-150"></image>
            <image xlink:href="/images/components/apollo-tasks-list/logo_essentials_color_2.png" class="brand-color-filter opacity-50" width="1000" height="800" x="0" y="-150"></image>
        {{else if (eq @taskList 'look_professional')}}
            <image xlink:href="/images/components/apollo-tasks-list/look_professional_mockup.png" width="1000" height="800" x="0" y="-150"></image>
            <image xlink:href="/images/components/apollo-tasks-list/look_professional_color.png" class="brand-color-filter" width="1000" height="800" x="0" y="-150"></image>
            <image xlink:href="{{@brandVersion.mockupUrl}}" width="90" height="90" x="240" y="150" transform="rotate(17)"></image>
            <image xlink:href="{{@brandVersion.mockupUrl}}" width="310" height="130" x="410" y="-60" transform="rotate(17)"></image>
            <image xlink:href="{{@brandVersion.mockupUrl}}" width="130" height="70" x="190" y="-32" transform="rotate(17)" filter="url(#whiteWash)"></image>
        {{/if}}
    </svg>

{{t 'wizard.edit.tweaks.initials.title'}}

{{#if (not this.validInitials)}} {{t 'wizard.edit.tweaks.initials.invalid_input'}} {{/if}} {{else if (eq this.editor.currentState 'initial_size')}}

{{t 'wizard.edit.tweaks.caps.title_text'}}
{{/if}}

{{#if (eq this.editor.currentState 'tagline_text')}}
{{t 'wizard.edit.tweaks.tagline.text_title'}}
{{#if (not this.validTagline)}}

{{/if}} {{else if (eq this.editor.currentState 'tagline_size')}}
{{else if (eq this.editor.currentState 'tagline_spacing')}}
{{/if}}
